data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Nandi who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nandi, Kenya
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Nandi hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Nandi, Kenya. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Nandi to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Midgan people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Nandi to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Nandi, Kenya.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, help the 373,520 believers in Nandi to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

location.name: Nandi
location.people_groups_list: Kachchi, Somali Ajuran, Arab, Yemeni, Sindhi, Hindi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kachchi (80,000), Somali Ajuran (232,000), Arab, Yemeni (36,000), Sindhi (3,300), Hindi (6,700)
